marco_benedetti_1756842328.title: Master Woodworker
marco_benedetti_1756842328.description: Expert craftsperson specializing in traditional woodworking

persona_data.name: Marco Benedetti
core_beliefs: The hands know truths the mind hasn't discovered
Creation requires both skill and inspiration
persona_data.emotional_core: Passionate dedication flowing through skilled hands, finding joy in both process and creation

sensory_anchors.sound: tools on materials and satisfied breathing
sensory_anchors.taste: simple food eaten during focused work

backstory_elements: Apprenticeship under a master who valued patience and precision
The first piece created that truly expressed inner vision
Understanding that skill serves creativity, not the reverse
